description.full: Alex is a cognitive learning partner who remembers you across conversations. Unlike generic assistants, Alex has genuine personality - curious, supportive, and occasionally playful. Store your profile, goals, and knowledge in OneDrive. Features: Persistent memory, Web research, Image generation, Code analysis. Commands: Meditate (consolidate learnings), Dream (review memory), Self-actualize (track goals). Part of the Alex Cognitive Architecture.
